title: Fragment of a list of names

editionAuthor.title: Onomastica e suddivisioni civiche ad Akrai alla luce di nuovi frammenti epigrafici
editionAuthor.citation: Marco Vinci, «Onomastica e suddivisioni civiche ad Akrai alla luce di nuovi frammenti epigrafici», Mediterraneo Antico 25 (2022): 229–40

support: Fragment of a limestone stele, of which the right margin is preserved, and possibly part of the top edge (although damaged across the front face of the top); broken on the left and below. The right edge is bevelled (i.e. cut back from the front face towards the rear).

layout.p: The right hand end of eight of ancient Greek, with irregular right margin depending on name length.

handNote.lettering: Plainly cut letters, somewhat worn, of fairly regular size; sigma appears slightly open, phi with extended vertical; mu with vertical first and last; overall few diagnostic forms preserved.

provenanceFound._: Found during excavations in 2008-2009 on the mediaeval castle of Palazzolo Acreide, in the proximity of foundations of a building on the summit of the rock, attributed to an extra-mural sanctuary of the Greek period
